Name: Pit of Evil
About the game: This game was re-released in October 2019 with Version 2.0. We increased the story and dialogue from 15.000 to 40.000 words and added alot more content to the game. Update Please notice: game was last updated to Version 2.0.2 on 25th October 2019. Check out the new demo The demo includes the first chapter of the game, the savefiles are fully compatible with the full version. Main Characters Story Barry and his friends Arlene and Nellie decide to visit the Pit of Evil, the place where they lost their friend Fynn. While spending the night in a tent, things take an unexpected turn. The group gets seperated, while Barry suffers the same fate as Fynn, falling into the Pit of Evil. Features Twisted Story with mystery elements Characters that hold deep connections to each other Fast-Paced ATB System (Active Time Battle) On map encounters (Chrono Engine) Dungeons using puzzle elements Dramatic cut-scenes, including flashbacks Challenging boss fights Interactive world map and journal system
Meta Title: Pit of Evil: Oct 26, 2018, Frogmouth and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Pit of Evil? Check out the release date (Oct 26, 2018), developer insights from Frogmouth, and a complete game summary.
